PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 56-year-old divorced woman living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. born and raised in the country, she identifies as a white non-hispanic protestant. 

sarah is a devout born-again evangelical christian, attending religious services more than once a week. her strong religious beliefs shape her conservative ideology and republican party affiliation. despite having only some college education, she is an avid consumer of information, frequently using the internet several times a day.

financially, sarah falls into the lower-income bracket, earning less than $30,000 annually. however, she is a registered voter and takes her civic duties seriously, aligning with the conservative republican stance on most issues.

while sarah may have faced challenges in her personal life, being divorced, she remains steadfast in her faith and political convictions. her metropolitan lifestyle allows her to engage with like-minded individuals and participate in activities that align with her values and beliefs.
